summary.body: I don't know if we are alone in this problem My name and address held by the DVLA don't match exactly those held by the Congestion Charging people at Coventry. The DVLA have my forenames in full; the Congestion Charging people have only room for a middle initial. The congestion charging people tell me that to resolve this I need to change my details at the DVLA. This is because the Congestion Charging computer system run by Capita, those exemplars of IT efficiency, is rubbish. I would advise anyone with a residents discount to compare the details on both systems well ahead of  the renewal time. The two need to match exactly.
summary.subject: Congestion Charging Residents Discount DVLA Problem
